short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get a visual hint when your Kanban-style WIP limit has been exceeded in your task-tracking tool.  Currently supports Asana.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
***Note***: This is an an extension for the [Asana](https://www.asana.com/) productivity tool.   You must create an account with Asana in order to use it.

Using:

1. ***Log into Asana at https://www.asana.com/ ***

2. Create a task section with, say, ten tasks.

3. Add a number surrounded in square brackets at the end of your section name (e.g, "My section name [5]").

4. If you add five total tasks to that section, you'll see a yellow
warning stripe on the left.  If you add more than five, that stripe will turn red.

Legal:
